name: Cornelia de Lange syndrome
description: short stature, intellectual disability, limb abnormalities, distinctive facial features

name: Ataxia-telangiectasia
description: progressive ataxia, nystagmus, oculomotor apraxia, immunodeficiency

name: Duchenne muscular dystrophy
description: progressive muscle weakness, delayed walking, high creatine kinase

name: Marfan syndrome
description: tall stature, long limbs, lens dislocation, aortic aneurysm

name: Rett syndrome
description: developmental regression in girl, loss of purposeful hand use, stereotypic hand movements
